forum.content: I never met you before, where very desolate. I can not flattering, I can look cold, I can diet alone. But I met you after all not the same. I want to be a little warmer, I want you to love me. Every time I think of your smile, I forgive all who endured despair. It's so good! Really reluctant. Even if I do not belong, still can not forget. It is worth or not? You will be willing to give up the darkness only light it?
forum.title: 失戀
